subject: Running
New York City Marathon
Olympic Games (2008)
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Shalane Flanagan, who won bronze in the 10,000 meters at the 2008 Beijing Games, would like to compete both on the track and the road at the 2012 or 2016 Olympics.
snippet: Shalane Flanagan, who won bronze in the 10,000 meters at the 2008 Beijing Games, would like to compete both on the track and the road at the 2012 or 2016 Olympics.
